attributes.review: I got this app hoping to see this man become president again  and I wanted to see his plans for the next 4 years. I believe that Trump sent telemarketers to my phone and I am DISAPPOINTED, he is not a true Christian!!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app expecting to keep up with Donald trumps campaign, but as soon as I downloaded it, my camera started to blink as if it were recording me. Since then I’ve felt like I was being watched and received messages of unknown numbers to go outside and meet people in their cars. I have heard Donald trump supports child trafficking but only assumed it was a rumor. Now I’m terrified of the Cheeto man and what he is capable of doing. DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP.
attributes.title: VERY DISTURBING

attributes.review: I saw the reviews on this app but thought that our president couldn’t possibly have made the horrible app they were claiming it was but after downloading I found out that everything the reviews said was absolutely true. My cat began having extreme stomach problems and the same day my fish died. So after much debate I finally decided to delete the app.😪
attributes.title: Horrible don’t recommend🤢
